attributes.action: Commission Independant Review of 2012 Olympic Ticketing Process
attributes.additional_details:
To conduct a full independant "User Focussed" Satisfaction Review of the 2012 Olympic Ticketing Process; to include (but not limited to):-

 Responsibilty/Governance Structure.
- Aims and objectives of ticketing process.
- Identification of risks/mitigations agreed.
- Specification to define "Client Requirements" for Ticket Sales Method and Operational Process.
- Tender Procurement Process & Evaluation that led to appointment of Private Ticketing Contractor.
- etc.

rejection.details: This is a matter for LOCOG.
